description: This file defines a React context-based state management system for a Kanban board application, including initial state, action types, reducer logic, context providers, and hooks for accessing state and dispatch. It also initializes IndexedDB and loads initial data.

methods.name: appReducer
methods.description: Reducer function handling state updates based on dispatched actions.

methods.name: AppStateProvider
methods.description: React component providing application state context, initializing IndexedDB and loading initial data.

methods.name: useAppState
methods.description: Hook to access current application state.

methods.name: useAppDispatch
methods.description: Hook to access dispatch function for state updates.
